May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers **Source** [Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars](/Sources.aspx?ID=194) pg. 80 **Usage** affixed to armor or a weapon --- This small crystal vial contains the forked end of a [demon's](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=28) tongue, preserved in brine. The spell attack roll of any spell cast by Activating this item is +7, and the spell DC is 17.
  • **Armor** You gain resistance 2 to acid and attacks by demons.
  • **Weapon** After you cast an [acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3) spell by Activating the _pickled demon tongue_, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d4 acid damage until end of your next turn.
Pickled Demon Tongue **Source** [Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars](/Sources.aspx?ID=194) pg. 80 **Price** 60 gp Pickled Demon Tongue (Greater) **Source** [Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars](/Sources.aspx?ID=194) pg. 80 **Price** 460 gp --- Resistance when affixed to armor is 5, extra damage when affixed to a weapon is 1d6, the spell attack roll is +14, and the spell DC is 24. Pickled Demon Tongue (Major) **Source** [Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars](/Sources.aspx?ID=194) pg. 80 **Price** 1,750 gp --- Resistance when affixed to armor is 10, extra damage when affixed to a weapon is 1d8, the spell attack roll is +19, and the spell DC is 29.
name: Pickled Demon Tongue (Major)
